items.query: SELECT date AS 'Time', tempf AS 'Outside', tempinf AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`rcweather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date

SELECT date AS 'Time', humidity AS 'Outside', humidityin AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`rcweather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Thermostat' FROM `{my_schema}`.`thermostat_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Dining' FROM `{my_schema}`.`dining_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Guest' FROM `{my_schema}`.`guest_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Kitchen' FROM `{my_schema}`.`kitchen_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Master' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Living' FROM `{my_schema}`.`living_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Humidifier' FROM `{my_schema}`.`humidifier_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT CollectionTime AS 'Time', TrapTemperature*9/5+32 AS 'Trap', HotWaterValveTemp*9/5+32 AS 'HW', ColdWaterValveTemp*9/5+32 AS 'CW', (1-HotWaterValveOFF)*10+20 AS 'HW Valve', (1-ColdWaterValveOFF)*10+15 AS 'CW Valve' FROM `{my_schema}`.`FreezeProtection` WHERE CollectionTime > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY CollectionTime
SELECT date AS 'Time', tempf AS 'Outside' FROM `{my_schema}`.`rcweather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT Time AS 'Time', HousePowerW AS 'House' FROM `{my_schema}`.`MeterData` WHERE Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Humidifier' FROM `{my_schema}`.`humidifier_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Refrigerator' FROM `{my_schema}`.`fridge_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'A/C Power' FROM `{my_schema}`.`ac_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Solar HW' FROM `{my_schema}`.`solar_hw_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value > 0 AND value < 4000 ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value*.2 AS 'LR Light' FROM `{my_schema}`.`lrlight_power` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT Time AS 'Time', OutWattsNow AS 'North Array' FROM `{my_schema}`.`SolarEnergy` WHERE Name = 'North Array' AND Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT Time AS 'Time', OutWattsNow AS 'South Array' FROM `{my_schema}`.`SolarEnergy` WHERE Name = 'South Array' AND Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT date AS 'Time', solarradiation as SolarRad FROM `{my_schema}`.`rcweather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT Time AS 'Time', GPM AS 'Gallons/Min' FROM `{my_schema}`.`MeterData` WHERE Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT Time AS 'Time', WaterEnable AS 'MasterValveON' FROM `{my_schema}`.`MeterData` WHERE Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT Time AS 'Time', AvgWaterPowerW AS 'Well Power' FROM `{my_schema}`.`MeterData` WHERE Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Temperature'), 1) AS 'Temp', round(json_value(message, '$.Humidity'), 1) AS 'Humidity', (json_value(message, '$.Burner') = 'ON')*20+20 AS 'Furnace', (json_value(message, '$.MotionDetected') = 'ON')*10+15 AS 'Motion' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c70fc9/data' AND  RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 110 ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.LightLevel') * 0.4 AS 'Light' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39'))  AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT date AS 'Time', solarradiation AS 'Outside Light' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Temperature'), 1) AS 'Window Temp' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39'))  AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Room Temp' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT date AS 'Time', tempf AS 'Outside Temp' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT date AS 'Time', uv AS 'Out UV' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Humidity'), 1) AS 'Humidity' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39')) AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 110 ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.LightLevel') * .4 AS 'Light' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE (topic='3c71bf36ea05/data') AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Temperature'), 1) AS 'Temp' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE (topic='3c71bf36ea05/data') AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Humidity'), 1) AS 'Humidity' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE (topic='3c71bf36ea05/data') AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 110 ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT date AS 'Time', tempf AS 'Outside Temp' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT date AS 'Time', solarradiation AS 'Outside Light' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT date AS 'Time', uv AS 'Out UV' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT `Time` AS 'Time', `W` AS 'Watts' FROM `{my_schema}`.`solarinverter_102` WHERE W >= -1 AND Time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY Time
SELECT date AS 'Time', solarradiation AS 'Outside' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Master' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.Temperature') AS 'Master Window' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39')) AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.Temperature') AS 'Guest' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c704c5/data' AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`computer_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT date AS 'Time', tempf AS 'Outside', tempinf AS 'Hallway' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Living' FROM `{my_schema}`.`living_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Kitchen' FROM `{my_schema}`.`kitchen_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Mud' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mud_temp` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', round(json_value(message, '$.Temperature'), 1) AS 'Garage' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c70fc9/data' AND json_value(message, '$.Temperature') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', (json_value(message, '$.Fan') = 'ON')*20+20 AS 'Fan' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c70fc9/data' AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Master' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_light` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value < 2000 AND value >= 0 ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.LightLevel') * 0.4 AS 'Master Window' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39')) AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`computer_light` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value < 2000 AND value >= 0 ORDER BY time
SELECT date AS 'Time', solarradiation AS 'Outside' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT date AS 'Time', uv AS 'Out UV' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Living' FROM `{my_schema}`.`living_light` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value < 2000 AND value >= 0 ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Kitchen' FROM `{my_schema}`.`kitchen_light` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value < 2000 AND value >= 0 ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Mud' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mud_light` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' AND value < 2000 AND value >= 0 ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', (json_value(message, '$.MotionDetected') = 'ON')*16 AS 'Master Window' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39')) AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', (value != 0)*15 AS 'Master' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_motion` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', (json_value(message, '$.MotionDetected') = 'ON')*14 AS 'Guest' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c704c5/data' AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', (value != 0)*13 AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`computer_motion` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', (value != 0)*12 AS 'Living' FROM `{my_schema}`.`living_motion` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', (value != 0)*11 AS 'Kitchen' FROM `{my_schema}`.`kitchen_motion` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', (value != 0)*10 AS 'Mud' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mud_motion` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', (json_value(message, '$.MotionDetected') = 'ON')*9 AS 'Garage' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c70fc9/data' AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Master' FROM `{my_schema}`.`master_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', ROUND(json_value(message, '$.Humidity'),1) AS 'Master Window' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE ((topic='a020a6135ed9/data' AND RecTime < '2019-11-16 17:00') OR (topic='3c71bf36eb61/data' AND RecTime > '2019-11-16 16:39')) AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', json_value(message, '$.Humidity') AS 'Guest' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c704c5/data' AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Computer' FROM `{my_schema}`.`computer_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT date AS 'Time', humidityin AS 'Hallway' FROM `{my_schema}`.`weather` WHERE date > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY date
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Living' FROM `{my_schema}`.`living_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Kitchen' FROM `{my_schema}`.`kitchen_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time
SELECT time AS 'Time', value AS 'Mud' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mud_hum` WHERE time > '{BeginDate}' ORDER BY time

SELECT RecTime AS 'Time', ROUND(json_value(message, '$.Humidity'),1) AS 'Garage' FROM `{my_schema}`.`mqttmessages` WHERE topic='cc50e3c70fc9/data' AND json_value(message, '$.Humidity') < 150 AND RecTime  > '{BeginDate}' AND RecTime  < now(6) ORDER BY RecTime
